ygData.subject: RE: Anti-charming
ygData.msgSnippet: Same applies for being Feared. Xakthan Lord of Shadows Follower of the Crimson Knights +ADw---- Enigma ---+AD4- http://members.door.net/enigma ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Same applies for being Feared.


Xakthan
Lord of Shadows
Follower of the Crimson Knights

--- Enigma ---
http://members.door.net/enigma

-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell +AFs-mailto:dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com+AF0-
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 10:03 AM
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Anti-charming

From: +ACI-dlobdell+ACI- dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com

Your theory is correct, when in a battle, if a person in your party is charmed, he will NOT get xp for anything killed during the duration of the charm...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe
is that no one has bothered to make contact with us.+ACI-

-----Original Message-----
From: Fling, Kirby FlingKirby+AEA-GACNW.com
To: 'EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com' EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 4:55 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Anti-charming


From: +ACI-Fling, Kirby+ACI- FlingKirby+AEA-GACNW.com

On a related note: On that foray against the evil eye.... The other 5
people all got charmed in our group... they started attacking while I was
AFK, so I got there halfway through the battle. I unloaded all my manna at
the eye and successfully killed it. I got an experience message, but nobody
else in the group did. My current theory is that once you are charmed, you
count as a monster, and won't get the experience message for any group kills
during that time. Unfortunately, this is also hard to test. Unfortunately
that mishap resulted in the death of more than half our party... but when I
looked at my XP-o-meter, I got a huge chunk of XP from the fight (if my
theory is correct, I got all of the XP)

-Kzak


-----Original Message-----
When fighting evil eyes in the gorge the other night, I hit the sit button
while charmed somehow. The result was canceling the charm, which allowed me
to continue with my battle. I managed to do this repeatedly throughout the
night. This could be a coincidence or an actual bug in the game, I'm not
sure. Since I felt it was cheating, I quit doing it and left the gorge+ADs-
after all, I only wanted another Polished Bone Bracer +ADs-)
